member.name: T:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbFunctionAttribute
member.summary: Maps a static CLR method to a database function so that the CLR method may be used in LINQ queries. By convention uses the .NET method name as name of the database function and the default schema.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbFunctionAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbFunctionAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The name of the function in the database.
The schema of the function in the database.

member.name: P:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbFunctionAttribute.FunctionName
member.summary: The name of the function in the database.

member.name: P:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbFunctionAttribute.Schema
member.summary: The schema of the function in the database.

member.name: T:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Infrastructure.ILazyLoader
member.summary: A service that can be injected into entities to give them the capability of loading navigation properties automatically the first time they are accessed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Infrastructure.ILazyLoader.Load(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Loads a navigation property if it has not already been loaded.
member.param: The entity on which the navigation property is located.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Infrastructure.ILazyLoader.LoadAsync(System.Object,System.Threading.CancellationToken,System.String)
member.summary: Loads a navigation property if it has not already been loaded.
member.param: The entity on which the navigation property is located.
A to observe while waiting for the task to complete.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation.

member.name: T:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Infrastructure.LazyLoaderExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for the service that make it more convenient to use from entity classes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Infrastructure.LazyLoaderExtensions.Load``1(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Infrastructure.ILazyLoader,System.Object,``0@,System.String)
member.summary: Loads a navigation property if it has not already been loaded.
member.typeparam: The type of the navigation property.
member.param: The loader instance, which may be null.
The entity on which the navigation property is located.
A reference to the backing field for the navigation.
member.returns: The loaded navigation property value, or the navigation property value unchanged if the loader is null.

member.name: T:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.OwnedAttribute
member.summary: Marks a type as owned. All references to this type will be configured as owned entity types.

member.name: T:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Internal.AbstractionsStrings
member.summary: This API supports the Entity Framework Core infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. This API may change or be removed in future releases.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Internal.AbstractionsStrings.ArgumentIsEmpty(System.Object)
member.summary: The string argument '{argumentName}' cannot be empty.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Internal.AbstractionsStrings.CollectionArgumentIsEmpty(System.Object)
member.summary: The collection argument '{argumentName}' must contain at least one element.
